name: Bouncedown 2
description:
Bouncedown 2 is a remake of Bouncedown, originally on Funorb.com, with HD graphics and balanced gameplay. This arcade style game comes with 24 achievements and online highscores to compete with friends and other players across the world. Can you grab all 24 achievements?

Bounce down and navigate various platforms while avoiding spikes and lava. Do you play best as big splat or small splat? The choice is yours. Fall through cloud platforms, jump far and wide on bounce platforms, and go with the flow on escalator platforms. Mastery of all platforms is key in this fast paced survival arcade game.
